info.title: Contract Accounting Dunning - Read
info.description: Read dunning history items for a business partner and read corresponding dunned items with this service.

x-sap-shortText: Retrieve a list of Contract Accounting (FI-CA) dunning history items from your SAP S/4HANA Cloud system using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Finance - Contract Accounting Open Item Management Integration(SAP_COM_0361)
[Contract Accounting - Open Item Management(2UJ)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2UJ " Link To BP ")
[Contract Accounting: Open Item Management(PUJ)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/PUJ " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET CADunning HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
